pages.text: $(italic)Compared to the bow, the crossbow maintains a rather inconspicuous existence.$(br2)With the Sniping Enchantment however, it turns the crossbow into a deadly ranged weapon.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Increases damage, accuracy and projectile speed.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to crossbows.$(br)Mutually exclusive with Multishot.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a common Book with Sniping by surrounding your Enchanter with Pigment and the other required materials.
